frontMatter.title: Performance testing HTTP/1.1 vs HTTP/2 vs HTTP/2 + Server Push for REST APIs
frontMatter.summary: When building web services, a common wisdom is to try to reduce the number of HTTP requests to improve performance. There are a variety of benefits to this, including less total bytes being sent, but the...
